commands.name: tsvm
commands.description: Generates TypeScript view model interfaces from existing C# view model classes.

commands.name: tsapi
commands.description: Generates TypeScript Api classes from existing C# classes.

commands.name: jsres
commands.description: Generates localized JSON objects containing multi-language strings.

commands.name: reskey
commands.description: Generates a C# class containing existing keys in resource files as constant string fields.

commands.name: tssec
commands.description: Generates TypeScript security types from existing C# types.

commands.name: refdb
commands.description: Refreshes system and company databases with latest schema changes.

commands.name: csmodel
commands.description: Generates C# model layer classes from XML entity metadata.
